name: Pinterest
short_description:
Pinterest is a visual bookmarking tool for saving and discovering creative
ideas.
long_description:
Pinterest is a visual discovery and planning tool. People ("Pinners") use the
site and apps to get ideas for their future, such as recipes, places to travel,
and products to buy, and save the things they love to their own boards. Pinners
also follow the boards of others who they find interesting. The site experienced
[rapid growth](http://techcrunch.com/2011/12/22/pinterest-40-fold/) in the
second half of 2011 and is now a widely used social media application.
